MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.40am to repair broken overhead line equipment at Kiersmill and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11am on Tuesday 1st December 2020.
